item.title: Pile up of rubbish outside 38-40 Wellington Gardens, 22nd December
item.description:
As well as overflowing bins there is cardboard and a supermarket shopping trolley piled high with rubbish. And don't tell me to report this to Wanzi as they do not deal. This stretch of pavement is a disgrace.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wellington Gardens, Charlton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Intersection of Christchurch avenue and Brondesbury Park, 22nd December
item.description:
On both the foot path and road side there is a build up of leaves/debris. This means it floods when it rains and looks messy at other times.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brondesbury Park, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overloaded cardboard, 22nd December
item.description:
Once again people not breaking up cardboard and dumping on floor around bins and overloading bins

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Erith - James Watt Way Street Not Being Swept, 22nd December
item.description:
Pavements close to the Morrisons roundabout are disfigured with leaves & litter that's coming from both McDonalds & KFC that are located on this street. The company that is contracted to clean this street overlooks the walk ways so the debris builds up into an unsightly mess. Please instruct the Street cleaning staff to direct their attentions to using their brooms to clear this area on a regular basis.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): James Watt Way, Slade Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Chesterfield Grove (along the wall off Joe the Juice shop around the corner) 3rd Complaint, 22nd December
item.description:
This is the 3rd complaint filed. There are more bags of rubbish located in the same space. It is a health and safety hazard in regards to vermin and dangerous to residents and the wider community.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Chesterfield Grove, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light on during the day in Cumberland Road No. 2, 22nd December
item.description:
The light attached to street lighting column C378 in Cumberland Road is on during the day. Please would you inspect and fix the problem so that the light functions normally again and only comes on during the hours of darkness.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Durham Road, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lighting column C372 in Cumberland Road, 22nd December
item.description:

item.title: Cardboard dumped next to bus shelter in Hayes Lane, 22nd December
item.description:

item.title: Fly tipping and overflowing bins, 21st December
item.description:
Persistent fly-tipping and overflowing bins in this area continue to create a mess. This issue has been reported several times and has not been resolved. Action is required as a matter of urgency.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Amhurst Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
